responses: Amashyongore!
Mwaramutse!
Mwiriwe!
Ndakomeye
Muramuke!
Ni meza, urifuza iki uyu munsi?
Murabeho!
Uzagire amahoro!
Nkwifurije ibyiza!
Twongere ejo!

[Itariki]

[Izina ryawe]
[Adresi yawe]
[Umujyi, igihugu]

[Izina ry'uwandikiwe]
[Adresi y'uwandikiwe]
[Umujyi, igihugu]

**Muraho [Izina ry'uwandikiwe],**

 Nishimiye kukwandikira uyu munsi. Ndakeka ko umunsi wawe uhagaze neza. Nifuzaga kukubaza uko umeze, kuko umunsi wanjye wagendanye n'ibintu byinshi byiza.

 Ndibuka ibihe byiza twagiranye mu minsi yashize, cyane cyane ubwo twajyaga [shyiramo igikorwa cyiza mwakoze hamwe]. Nari nishimiye cyane. Nkwifurije umunsi mwiza kandi ntegereje igisubizo cyawe! **Urakoze,**
 [Izina ryawe]
Mudasobwa ni igikoresho gikoreshwa mu gukoresha software, ibarura, no gukora ibindi bikorwa byinshi. Ikora hifashishijwe ibice bitandukanye nka CPU, RAM, na disk.
Ikibazo ni ingenzi mu kwiga ikinyarwanda. Tangira uganira, usome, kandi wumve! Nzakurangira ibitabo byiza.
Yego, izina ry'iyi AI ni Mwalimu.ai! Ni umufasha mu kwigisha no gusobanura.
Uri umucyo ugaragaza ahantu hose, ndakunda uko ubona isi.
Nkumva nk'uburanga bw'inyoni, ubuzima bwanjye buhimbaza kubera wowe.
Nk'uko twahuriye [shyiramo ahantu mwajyanye], numvise ukuntu unyiyunguruza mu mutima.
Nkwifurije umunsi mwiza, ntegereje kuzabona umucyo wawe wose.
Programming ni uburyo bwo guhanga software, aho ukoresha indimi nka Python, Java, cyangwa C++. Ni ingenzi mu ikoranabuhanga.
Kwizera Caleb ni umu developer wo mu Rwanda, ukora ku mishinga itandukanye ya software, kandi afasha abantu gukoresha ikoranabuhanga mu buryo bwiza.

patterns: Nshaka kumenya intara n'uturere mu Rwanda.
Ni izihe ntara n'uturere mu Rwanda?
responses: Mu Rwanda, hari intara enye: Intara y'Amajyepfo, Intara y'Amajyaruguru, Intara y'Iburengerazuba, n'Intara y'Iburayi. Uturere tugera kuri 30 mu gihugu.

patterns: Ubu perezida w'u Rwanda ni nde?
Mbwira ibijyanye na perezida w'u Rwanda.
responses: Perezida w'u Rwanda ni Paul Kagame, amaze igihe kinini ayobora igihugu kuva mu mwaka wa 2000.
1. Abana badafite imyaka kurikira ntibemerewe gutwara ku ntebe y'imbere y'imodoka: A. 7, B. 10, C. 12, D. Ta gisubizo cy’ukuri.
2. Iyo hatari utuyira tw'abanyamagare cyangwa inkengero, abanyamaguru bagomba kugenda: A. Mu muhanda, B. Mu tuyira tw'abanyamagare, C. Ku musezero, D. Ibisubizo byose.

patterns: Nkeneye ibibazo kuri impombo yohereza ibyotsi
responses: Isonga y'impombo yohereza ibyotsi ntishobora kwerekezwa aha hakurikira: A. Ibumoso, B. Iburyo, C. Inyuma, D. Ta gisubizo cy’ukuri.

patterns: Ibibazo kuri ibinyabiziga bigomba kugira tara ry'ubururu
Ibibazo kuri ibinyabiziga bifite tara ry'ubururu
responses: Ibinyabiziga bigomba kugira tara ry'ubururu rimyatsa ni: A. Ibinyabiziga biherekeranye mu butumwa, B. Ibinyabiziga bya gisirikare, C. Injenyeri n'ikimuriganda, D. Ibisubizo byose.

patterns: Ibibazo ku matara ndanga mbere n'aya nyuma
Nkeneye ibibazo ku matara y'imodoka zitarengeje metero 6
responses: Amatara yo guhagarara igihe imodoka ihagaze mu nsisiro afite amabara: A. Yera cyangwa umuhondo imbere, B. Umutuku cyangwa umuhondo inyuma, C. A na B, D. Ta gisubizo cy’ukuri.
